articles.title: Disney, Universal plan to develop affordable housing units in Florida - Business Insider
articles.description: Disney announced plans to develop affordable housing units near its Walt Disney World Florida resort.
articles.content:
Disney plans to develop 1,300 affordable housing units across around 80 acres of its land in Orange County, Florida, close to its theme parks, as US house prices continue to outpace wage growth.
The… [+1948 chars]
